Title: TC001 - Successful Registration with Valid Data
Steps:
1. Navigate to https://sauce-demo.myshopify.com/account/register
2. Enter First Name: Tuang
3. Enter Last Name: Test
4. Enter Email: tuang@test.com
5. Enter Password: 12345
6. Click 'Create' or 'Register' button
Expected Result: User is successfully registered and redirected to the account page. A confirmation message or welcome message is displayed.

Title: TC002 - Registration with Blank First Name
Steps:
1. Navigate to https://sauce-demo.myshopify.com/account/register
2. Leave First Name blank
3. Enter Last Name: Test
4. Enter Email: tuang@test.com
5. Enter Password: 12345
6. Click 'Create' or 'Register' button
Expected Result: An error message is displayed indicating First Name is required. Registration does not proceed.

Title: TC003 - Registration with Blank Last Name
Steps:
1. Navigate to https://sauce-demo.myshopify.com/account/register
2. Enter First Name: Tuang
3. Leave Last Name blank
4. Enter Email: tuang@test.com
5. Enter Password: 12345
6. Click 'Create' or 'Register' button
Expected Result: An error message is displayed indicating Last Name is required. Registration does not proceed.

Steps:

2. Enter First Name: Tuang
3. Enter Last Name: Test
4. Leave Email blank
5. Enter Password: 12345

Title: TC005 - Registration with Invalid Email Format
Steps:
1. Navigate to https://sauce-demo.myshopify.com/account/register
2. Enter First Name: Tuang
3. Enter Last Name: Test
4. Enter Email: tuang@test (invalid format)
5. Enter Password: 12345
6. Click 'Create' or 'Register' button
Expected Result: An error message is displayed indicating the email format is invalid. Registration does not proceed.

Title: TC006 - Registration with Blank Password
Steps:
1. Navigate to https://sauce-demo.myshopify.com/account/register
2. Enter First Name: Tuang
3. Enter Last Name: Test
4. Enter Email: tuang@test.com
5. Leave Password blank
6. Click 'Create' or 'Register' button
Expected Result: An error message is displayed indicating Password is required. Registration does not proceed.

Title: TC007 - Registration with Already Registered Email
Preconditions: User is on https://sauce-demo.myshopify.com/account/register and the email tuang@test.com is already registered
Steps:
1. Navigate to https://sauce-demo.myshopify.com/account/register
2. Enter First Name: Tuang
3. Enter Last Name: Test
4. Enter Email: tuang@test.com (already registered)
5. Enter Password: 12345
6. Click 'Create' or 'Register' button
Expected Result: An error message is displayed indicating the email is already in use. Registration does not proceed.

Title: TC008 - Registration with Weak Password (Too Short)
Steps:
1. Navigate to https://sauce-demo.myshopify.com/account/register
2. Enter First Name: Tuang
3. Enter Last Name: Test
4. Enter Email: tuang@test.com
5. Enter Password: 12345 (5 characters - check if below minimum requirement)
6. Click 'Create' or 'Register' button
Expected Result: If minimum password length is enforced (e.g. 6+ chars), an error message is displayed indicating the password is too short. Registration does not proceed.

Title: TC009 - All Fields Blank Submission
Steps:
1. Navigate to https://sauce-demo.myshopify.com/account/register
2. Leave all fields (First Name, Last Name, Email, Password) blank
3. Click 'Create' or 'Register' button
Expected Result: Error messages are displayed for all required fields. Registration does not proceed.

Title: TC010 - Verify Password Field Masks Input
Steps:
1. Navigate to https://sauce-demo.myshopify.com/account/register
2. Click on the Password field
3. Type: 12345
Expected Result: The entered password characters are masked (shown as dots or asterisks) and not visible as plain text.

Title: TC011 - Verify Page Title and Form Fields Present
Preconditions: User has a supported web browser
Expected Result: The registration page loads successfully. First Name, Last Name, Email, and Password fields are visible. A submit/register button is present.

Title: TC012 - Registration with Special Characters in First Name
Steps:
1. Navigate to https://sauce-demo.myshopify.com/account/register
2. Enter First Name: Tu@ng! (with special characters)
3. Enter Last Name: Test
4. Enter Email: tuang@test.com
5. Enter Password: 12345
6. Click 'Create' or 'Register' button
Expected Result: System either accepts or rejects special characters in the name field with an appropriate validation message.

Title: TC013 - Verify Navigation to Login Page from Register Page
Steps:
1. Navigate to https://sauce-demo.myshopify.com/account/register
2. Look for a 'Sign In' or 'Login' link
3. Click the link
Expected Result: User is redirected to the login/sign-in page.
